block_info.label: DFT Stream
block_info.description: DFT stream block targeted for AI Engines.

parameters.name: data_type
parameters.description: Select Input/Output data type from the dropdown menu.
parameters.label: Input/Output data type:

parameters.name: twiddle_type
parameters.description: Select the twiddle factor data type from the dropdown menu
parameters.label: Twiddle factor data type:

parameters.name: point_size
parameters.description: Enter the number of samples in the transform
parameters.label: DFT size:

parameters.name: num_frames
parameters.description: Enter the number of frames to be processed per input window of data
parameters.label: Number of frames per window:

parameters.name: shift_val
parameters.description: The power of 2 shift-down is applied to the accumulation of the DFT before output.
parameters.label: Scale output down by 2^:

parameters.name: rnd_mode
parameters.description: Select a rounding mode from the dropdown menu.
parameters.label: Rounding mode:

parameters.name: ssr
parameters.description: Specify the number of parallel input/output paths
parameters.label: SSR:

parameters.name: sat_mode
parameters.description: Select a saturation mode from the dropdown.
parameters.label: Saturation mode:

parameters.name: TP_API
parameters.description: The form of IO: 0 for windows, 1 for streams
parameters.label: API:

parameters.name: TP_FFT_NIFFT
parameters.description: Selects whether the transform to perform is an FFT (1) or IFFT (0)
parameters.label: FFT_NIFFT:
